title: Universal Design Framework for Inclusive Makerspace Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of the maker movement and basic spatial design, experience with digital educational tools
context.additional_context: Requires content structured for smartphone-based learning environments, considering learners from diverse cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can draft makerspace design proposals applying the eight principles of universal design (simplicity, collaboration, accessibility, etc.).
Learners can develop three or more maker activity scenarios reflecting the needs of users with diverse abilities and cultural backgrounds.
Learners can propose two or more practical strategies for operating inclusive makerspaces in resource-constrained technical environments.

resources: Makerspace Case Study Video (Mobile Streaming Compatible)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
